instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3024-b works with battery but not with charger
threads.message:
hey guys ,  

                     another crazy one to share for advise . 


 problem =PPBUS_G3H  is moving  between 2.5 volts to 4 volts .  i have checked thoroughly for liquid damage but could  not find anything may be under smc but no traces of liquid outside any where .  i do get green light some times .

i have tried another dc in board
dc voltage is about 16.15 volts 
 checked the follwing aswell

1. r7021 and 7022 reaing 20.1 ohms                    
2. r7051 and r7052 reading 2.9 ohms
 3. q7085 replaced 
and also have replaced u7000 


the system works on battery only .
kindly advise.

threads.title: 820-3024-b works with battery but not with charger
threads.message: Measure resistance on the pins of U7000 between 17/18 and 27/28. Also check R7005.

threads.title: 820-3024-b works with battery but not with charger
threads.message:
thanks for the reply
/ resistance between 17/18 is 3.0 ohms and 27/28 is 20.6 BUT r7005 was 166 ohms so removed and replaced with another resistor and now green light is coming every time i plug in the charger but the PPBUS_G3H is fluctuating quicker between 3.96 volts and 4.15 volts .

threads.title: 820-3024-b works with battery but not with charger
threads.message: If it does power from battery could be a bad soldering job....... Check under microscope U7000.....

threads.title: 820-3024-b works with battery but not with charger
threads.message: Check voltage in C7005 and check R7001. Could be bad soldering on 6259 too.
